ygData.subject: Re: need help finding a sword
ygData.msgSnippet: I d say level 25. Once you get to Firiona, once you leave the city, there are nasty spiders and leeches that are pretty tough to me. Following the
ygData.messageBody:
I'd say level 25.<br><br>Once you get to Firiona,
once you leave the city, there are nasty spiders and
leeches that are pretty tough to me. Following the river,
you can zone in to the Lake of Ill Omen, which is
good hunting for 25-30.<br><br>There are nearby zones
that are good hunting for up through the low 50s, but
I'll let you discover them yourself. They are always
one zone away from the one you just outgrew, or one
zone from Firiona.<br><br>Happy
hunting.<br><br>Iskandar Alazeem<br>Half elf warrior of 41
seasons<br>Member of Phoenix Dragoons, Prexus
